data.taskTitle: serversbadge.sv shows 3 running but dropdown only shows one
serversbadge.sv shows 3 running but dropdown only shows one
data.approach: The badge count comes from server sessions (tmux server-* sessions), but the dropdown iterates over projectsWithPorts (from /api/projects filtered by port). The mismatch occurs because some running server sessions (e.g. server-finance, server-ingest) dont have matching projects with port configured. Fix: include running server sessions in the dropdown even if their project has no port config.

data.taskTitle: serversbadge.sv shows 3 running but dropdown only shows one
summary: Fixed mismatch between badge count and dropdown by merging running server sessions into the project list
Added allProjects derived that combines configured projects with any running server-* sessions that lack config
Updated totalProjects to use merged list for consistent denominator
reviewFocus: Verify the dropdown now shows all running servers

data.taskTitle: serversbadge.sv shows 3 running but dropdown only shows one
summary: Fixed dropdown not showing all running servers by merging server sessions into project list
Fixed status detection: check last 10 lines first and prioritize ready patterns over starting patterns
Ingest servers now correctly show as Running instead of Starting
reviewFocus: Verify dropdown shows all running servers
Verify ingest server shows Running status

data.taskTitle: ServersBadge count mismatch + servers page widened

summary: Fixed ServersBadge count mismatch by merging configured projects with running server sessions that lack config entries
Fixed ingest server status detection by prioritizing recent output ready patterns over stale starting patterns
Widened /servers page table to show non-project server sessions alongside configured projects with read-only display and server badge
